title: Happy riding. Part 1
creator_credit: Mark Lawton, Euryn Ogwen-Williams, BBC Cymru Wales and Vis News
brief_description: One of a series which examines the art of horse riding. This film deals with buying a pony and other aspects such as what to look for when buying a pony, horse sales, postures, fencing and shelters, feeding, equipment, stable management and veterinary reports
